bogus.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: not true or real, although someone is trying to make you think it is
bogus.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: not real, but dishonestly pretending to be something or someone
bogus.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: They issue certificates of deposits, often based on fictitious assets such as bogus gold mines.
bogus claims of injury by their workers
